snippet.title: Tarisland - Official Closed Beta Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the latest Tarisland trailer for another look at this upcoming cross-platform MMORPG. A closed beta for Tarisland will be available in select regions starting on June 27, 2023. On Android, the closed beta will be available in Brazil, Canada, the Philippines, and the United Kingdom. On PC, the closed beta will be available across the globe, regardless of region.

In the Closed Beta, players will be able to select one of the seven character classes currently available before exploring the Ancash Canyon, SilverLit, the Misty Forest and their respective storylines and quests. Additionally, during the closed beta, you can try out five crafting professions, enter the Arena or the Battlegrounds, and, take on the World Bosses.

#IGN #Gaming #Tarisland
